original_text: So Moses gave command concerning them to Eleazar the priest and to Joshua the son of Nun and to the heads of the fathers' houses of the tribes of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 이에 모세가 그들에 대하여 제사장 엘르아살과 눈의 아들 여호수아와 이스라엘 자손 지파의 수령들에게 명령하니라

sentences.original_text: So Moses gave command concerning them
and to Joshua the son of Nun
and to the heads of the fathers' houses
of the tribes of the people of Israel.
